name: thai-smartcard
description: High-performance Smart Card Reader library - Native Rust bindings for PC/SC. Supports all smart card types (Thai ID, EMV, etc.)

scripts.build: napi build --platform --release && tsc index.ts --outDir . --module commonjs --target es2020 --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --declaration
scripts.build:dev: napi build --platform && tsc index.ts --outDir . --module commonjs --target es2020 --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --declaration
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo 'Pre-built binaries should be included. Run npm run build:all before publish if building locally.'
